tutorial_text.intro: Alright, I'll go over the basics of this place.
tutorial_text.seer_1: This one over here is the Seer.
tutorial_text.seer_2: They can make you stronger if you give them these strange blue crystals. Dunno what they are but the Seer wants em.
tutorial_text.blacksmith_1: Thats the blacksmith over there, his name is Smiffy.
tutorial_text.blacksmith_2: You can trade coins to him in exchange for gear.
tutorial_text.chest_1: Anything you've purchased will be stored in this chest by the door if you want to use it later.
tutorial_text.chest_2: You've only got 2 arms so you probably can only take 2 weapons at a time.
tutorial_text.exit_1: That brings us to that door over there, it's the exit.
tutorial_text.exit_2: It don't work like no normal door. It'll transport you to another plane and you'll need to fight your way out.
tutorial_text.game_1: Once you're out there, you'll get attacked by strange creatures.
tutorial_text.game_2: Sometimes they'll drop some coins or crystals that'll be sent back here through some magic mumbo jumbo.
tutorial_text.game_3: After a while you'll get this feeling drawing you in a certain direction. It'll lead you to a big arena with a stone pillar.
tutorial_text.gems_1: Outside, you can get these gems that change the effects of your weapons.
tutorial_text.gems_2: You just drag slot them in and then BAM special powers.
tutorial_text.gems_3: If you look at them long enough you can learn more about what they do.
tutorial_text.outro_1: Whelp, thats about all I can help you with at the moment. Good luck to ya!
tutorial_text.exit_without_weapon: Hey! Don't go out there without a weapon! If you already have one grab it from your equipment chest, otherwise go buy one from Smiffy.
